text: [] Catholic faithful carry wooden cross up summit for Good Friday - Karen Renee Nogoy/Pacific Daily News - - [0](/news/catholic-faithful-carry-wooden-cross-up-summit-for-good-friday/video_950842e2-ed6e-11ee-acc2-eb88538f8f49.html#comments) Members of the Cruz family and other Catholic faithful help carry a large wooden cross to the summit of Mount Jumullong-Manglo in observance of Good Friday on March 29, 2024.
